body_html:
The issue was keras_preprocessing was depending on keras. It is fixed in the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
While our dependency version is updated, you can always install TF with --no_deps and then install the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
Or you can simply install 1.12.0rc1 with --pre flag to pip install tensorflow
body_text:
The issue was keras_preprocessing was depending on keras. It is fixed in the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
While our dependency version is updated, you can always install TF with --no_deps and then install the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
Or you can simply install 1.12.0rc1 with --pre flag to pip install tensorflow
body:
The issue was keras_preprocessing was depending on keras. It is fixed in the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
While our dependency version is updated, you can always install TF with `--no_deps` and then install the latest version of keras_preprocessing.
Or you can simply install 1.12.0rc1 with `--pre` flag to `pip install tensorflow`
